LanguageData.PawnRotationDescription: Instead of calculating an angle and then reducing it to a north, south, west, east direction this code bypasses the angle and thus speeds up the calculation for the direction that a pawn faces.
LanguageData.ForbidByContextDescription: Marks items as forbidden based on who wants to do what with them. Food restrictions are implemented with this.
LanguageData.PreventAnimalFamiliesDescription: When parent relations or birth tales are created this prevents the action if its only for animals.
LanguageData.StopTamenessDecayDescription: Prevents the loss of taming and training progress over time.
LanguageData.TrackLevelUpDescription: Observes the skill levels of pawns and assigns thoughts that display motes.
LanguageData.ArchitectButtonVisibilityDescription: Instead of loading all buttons in the cache of the architect window, a filter for visibility is applied.
LanguageData.DefMapDescription: Fixes the save state to prevent data loss when changing the load order of mods that add custom records or work types.
LanguageData.RemnantColonyDescription: Replaces the behaviour when abondaning settlements to spawn a remnant colony instead of an abandoned faction base.
LanguageData.NumericTextboxesDescription: Vanilla input elements do not allow entering numbers that do not change the numeric value of the input. For example adding a zero after the decimal point as the last number or adding a zero at the beginning of the number. The new inputs do not destroy user input and display existing min max constraines if the input exceeds them. Also generates correct ids.
LanguageData.WorldPawnGCDescription: Garbage collection in vanilla runs redundant loops when determining if a dead pawn has a relation to a still living pawn. With the sprawling of animal families it causes massive lag spikes in long running games. By fixing the iteration a pawn with 10 relatives causes 10 checks instead of 100.
LanguageData.DoBillIngredientSearchRadiusDescription: In vanilla ingredients are searched map wide even if the ingredient radius limits the possible candidates to a much smaller area. This patch limits the search to regions that overlap with the ingredient search circle.
LanguageData.DoBillIngredientOverflowDescription: Recipes can consume too many ingredients if they allow mixing, like all meal recipes. This patch removes surplus ingredients from ingredient searches.
LanguageData.LanguageChangeListenerDescription: Triggers translation tasks when the language changes.
LanguageData.DebugMenuOptionsDescription: Adds entries to the debug menu for convenience.
